name: 陳正中
objective:
探討工作研究涵蓋之各項技術：時間研究、動作研究、程序分析、作業分析、影片分析、工作抽查、標準工時與效率管理、動作經濟原理、生產線平衡、生產力衡量等。
The purpose of this course is to provide students with a resource which describes the techniques and procedures of motion and time study .It contains: techniques of methods study, work station design, PTS, stop watch time study, standard data, assembly line balancing.
schedule:
WK#1 課程介紹 (Introduction to work study) 
WK#2 解決問題的工具 (Problem-solving tools)
WK#3 操作分析 (Operation analysis)
WK#4 人力工作分析 (Manual work design)
WK#5 工作場所、設備及工具設計 (Workplace, equipment and tool design)
WK#6 工作環境設計 (Work environment design)
WK#7 認知工作設計 (Design of cognitive work)
WK#8 工作場所及系統安全 (Work place and system safety)
WK# 9 期中考 (Midterm exam)
WK#10 時間研究 (Time study)
WK#11 評比與寬放 (Rating and allowance)
WK#12 標準資料法 (Standard data and formulas)
WK#13 預定時間系統 (Predetermined time systems)
WK#14 間接與管銷人工標準 (Indirect and expense labor standards)
WK#15 標準的追蹤與應用 (Standards follow-up and use)
WK#16 獎工制度 (Wage payment)
WK#17 訓練與其他管理實務 (Training and other management practices)
WK#18 期末考 (Final exam )
scorePolicy:
作業 (Homework) 20%
小考 (Quiz) 20%
期中考 (Midterm exam) 30%
期末考 (Final exam) 30%
materials: Andris Freivalds and Benjamin Niebel (2014). Niebel’s Methods, Standards, & Work Design (13th ed.). McGraw Hill, New York. (東華書局 / 新月圖書代理)
remarks: 若授課方式改線上教學，則以 Microsoft Teams 作為線上教學用軟體，期中、期末考試及報告以線上方式進行。
